verses.verse: "In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be a <S%H4726>spring<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> for <S%H2403>sin<s%> and for <S%H5079>uncleanness.<s%>

It will come to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H6091>idols<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they will be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> no <S%H5030>more.<s%> I will also cause the prophets and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2932>impurity<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

It will happen <S%H376>that,<s%> when anyone still <S%H5012>prophesies,<s%> then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> who <S%H3205>bore<s%> him will <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2421>him,<s%> 'You must die, because you <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>' and his <S%H3205>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> who <S%H3205>bore<s%> him will <S%H1856>stab<s%> him when he <S%H5012>prophesies.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> will <S%H376>each<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of his <S%H2384>vision,<s%> when he <S%H5012>prophesies;<s%> neither will they <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H155>mantle<s%> to <S%H3584>deceive:<s%>
but he will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5030><s%> 'I am no prophet, I am a <S%H5647>tiller<s%> of the <S%H120>ground;<s%> for I have been made a <S%H7069>bondservant<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>'

One will <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H4347>him,<s%> 'What are these wounds between your <S%H3027>arms?<s%>' Then he will <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H5221><s%> 'Those with which I was wounded in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H157>friends.<s%>'

<S%H5782>"Awake,<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> against my <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and against the <S%H1397>man<s%> who is <S%H5997>close<s%> to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> <S%H5221>"Strike<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> will be <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the little <S%H6819>ones.<s%>

It shall happen that in all the <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8147>"two<s%> <S%H6310>parts<s%> in it will be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> and <S%H1478>die;<s%> but the <S%H7992>third<s%> will be left in <S%H3498>it.<s%>

I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the third <S%H7992>part<s%> into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and will <S%H6884>refine<s%> them as <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H6884>refined,<s%> and will <S%H974>test<s%> them like <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H974>tested.<s%> They will <S%H7121>call<s%> on my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and I will <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H559>them.<s%> I will say, <S%H5971><s%> 'It is my people;' and they will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh is my <S%H430>God.<s%>'"
